resources.string:
XkcdViewer v%s. Application for viewing XKCD comics with hover text.

 XkcdViewer Copyright (C) 2009-2010, Tom Coxon, Tyler Breisacher.

 XKCD is Copyright (C) 2006 - 2010, Randall Munroe (http://xkcd.com)

 Contains some menu icons from www.androidicons.com, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution - Share Alike license.

 Application icon kindly donated by Johan Larsson.

 See the github page for this project for more information:
 	http://github.com/tcoxon/XkcdViewer/

 This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

 If you like this app, please consider donating. Thanks.
